DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate whether woman oral contraceptive ( OCs ) suffer acquire OC-associated female sexual dysfunction ( FSD ) least 3 month longer one year express level sexual distress take SH T00658ID compare Microgynon , usual OC prescribe woman OC-associated FSD .
DOC.criteria: OCassociated female sexual dysfunction ( FSD ) least 3 month longer one year willingness continue OC use switch SH T00658ID Microgynon Combined score sexual desire arousal domains FSFI questionnaire 18 screen baseline Contraindications oral contraceptive use , example limit : presence history venous arterial thrombotic / thromboembolic event , hypertension , presence history severe hepatic disease
